reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and expensive-looking, with thick scuba material that's comfortable enough for dancing all night. The dress is flattering for curvy figures, accentuating all curves, and one customer notes it feels like an expensive quality gown. The length receives mixed feedback - while it's great with heels, some find it runs a little long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality/Nice fabric/Crazy low price
items.body: First of all, I was impressed with the high quality fabric. It's the perfect weight and has a nice stretch. This dress is unbelievable for the cost!!! I ordered this and am Xscape dress to try for an upcoming ball. The Xscape dress was crazy flattering and won hands down. HOWEVER, i'm not returning this gown because it also looked great! Plus, it's an insane bargain! I think the top looked best pulled down on both shoulders. i loved the mermaid look at the bottom of the dress. This dress would pack easy and would be perfect for a formal night on a cruise, etc. I kept it because you never know when you might need a formal gown and I couldn't justify returning this beautiful bargain gown. Also, it's very form fitting, but is the kind of dress that I know I'll still be able to wear when I lose weight because the fabric is stretchy and allows you to bunch it up to create a nice illusion to flatter your tummy. If I wouldn't have ordered the Xscape dress that was super flattering, I absolutely would have felt great wearing this dress to a ball. I really cannot believe how great the quality is for this low price! LOVE it! Read more
items.author: M. Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress - size details here
items.body: This dress is beautiful. I ordered 3 to ensure I got the size right. I am 5’9 175 with a smaller chest and larger bottom. It suggested the large was the right size for me - it was very form fitting - which I don’t love. The XL was very roomy and comfortable and just left me feeling more comfortable - I did still wear spanx (just my comfort zone). If you are comfortable and confident with your body, order the suggested size. If you are less comfortable or like a roomier fit, size up. Oddly, the green came with a zipper in the back (xl). The blue (l and xl) did not. It wasn’t needed due to the wide neck - just stepped right in. The material is very thick so covers problem areas. Length was amazing - plenty of length for heels if you want or it liked great dragging a bit. Exceptional dress for a great price! Read more
items.author: Amelia V

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Dreas
items.body: This dress was perfect. The fabric was nice and it fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Yancy Freeman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Show stopper
items.body: This dress is stunning. I'm 5"3 with narrow waist and curvy hips and ordered based on hip measurements. I did have to have it tailored because it was too long and too much fabric on top. Absolutely worth it though! I received many compliments. I did take one star off because although the fabric is thick and feels great, it snags incredibly easily. I'll likely only get a few wears out of it before it's too snagged. Also the dye bleeds badly. I had a French manicure for the formal event and my hands and nails were completely black by the end of the night. It was quite embarrassing. Read more
items.author: grace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!!
items.body: Buy this dress! I needed a dress for a wedding and was hesitant to order this one, but super glad I did! I’m 5’9” 163lb, I purchased the large. It fit perfectly. It’s super comfortable and stretchy but doesn’t lose fit or form the longer you wear it. I wore a 1” heel, the length was perfect with that heel. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This dress was so elegant. Everyone made great compliments. This dress has the perfect material for the fall weather. Covers your feet. Peers well with heels or flats. For extra support and warmth, i wore a highwasted seamless shaping legging under it. Flattened and shaped all the right places. This dress is great for the big arm girlies, comfortable to. Read more
items.author: Marsha

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Weird cut on bottom and, most importantly, USED.
items.body: I loved the color, and it was solid, thick material. I did try one of the two that was sent me on and it had a weird cut toward the bottom. However, BOTH of the "new" dresses that were sent to me were very clearly used. One had cat scratches and cat hair all over it, and the other had deodorant stains and was inside out. It's a shame I now have to go to one of the drop off spots because they keep sending me used things. I had 7 things shipped, and of those, ONE was new. You can tell because they now send it back directly in the plastic bags people return them in. Gross and lazy. Read more
items.author: KC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, classy, sophisticated
items.body: This dress is beautiful! Drapes nicely, very figure flattering and I love the weight of the fabric. I purchased one in black and one in red. I’m 6’ tall and the length is perfect for me. You cannot beat this gown for the price - it is classy, sophisticated, elegant and complimentary to most figures. Read more
items.author: Amazonian

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Navy, Royal Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
